screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .xcf.bz2 file in GIMP 3
screenshot.caption: XCF.BZ2 file open in GIMP 3

description: GIMP is a layer-based image editor similar to Adobe Photoshop . Most users save images they are editing with GIMP as XCF files, but they may also export images as compressed archives to reduce their size.
For example, users can export an XCF file as an archive compressed with bzip2, XZ, or gzip compression algorithms. To export an XCF file as an XCF.BZ2 file, follow these steps:
NOTE: XCF.BZ2 files may also be saved as .XCFBZ2 files.
